item.title: The Wisdom of Crowds and groupthink in Agile Software Development
item.description: Gojko Adzicposted a summaryof a talk James Surowiecki gave at Agile 2008and it got me thinking how we use the Wisdom of Crowdsin Agile projects. One of the most interesting things I learnt from the book is that when you bring together a diverse group of people, their output will probably be better than any one expert.
